text: Aur Allah Taalaa ney tumharay liye tumharay gharon mein sakoonat ki jagah bana di hai aur ussi ney tumharay liye chopayon ki khalon kay ghar bana diye hain jinhen tum halka phulka patay ho apney kooch kay din aur apney theharney kay din bhi aur unn ki oon aur rooâ€™on aur baalon say bhi uss ney boht say saman aur aik waqt muqarrara tak kay liye faeeday ki cheezen banaeen
